briefTitle: A Single Arm Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of Pralatrexate in Subjects With Relapsed or Refractory PTCL
officialTitle: A Multi-center, Single Arm, Safety and Efficacy Study of Pralatrexate With Vitamin B12 and Folic Acid Supplementation in Subjects With Relapsed or Refractory Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma
summary: This is a single arm, open-label, multi-center study designed to demonstrate the efficacy and safety of pralatrexate when administered concurrently with vitamin B12 and folic acid supplementation to patients with relapsed or refractory peripheral T-cell lymphoma(PTCL).

primaryOutcome.measure: Objective Response Rate(ORR) by International Working Group Criteria
